metatags.twitter:title: Saint Kitts and Nevis Invites Crypto Investors To Acquire Citizenship by Investment — NTL Trust
metatags.og:title: Saint Kitts and Nevis Invites Crypto Investors To Acquire Citizenship by Investment — NTL Trust
metatags.og:description: Saint Kitts and Nevis is a small Caribbean country with a citizenship by investment program since 1984. The Federation keeps up with the times and world trends. Therefore, crypto investors can acquire citizenship and a passport by investing in cryptocurrency.

metatags.cxenseparse:description: Central banks control the circulation and supply of money globally, but the phenomenal rise of cryptocurrency poses a threat to their authority, control and power.
